attribute.description: Render the plugin with a border.
attribute.name: border

attribute.description: Converter instance registered with this component.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: Chemical file format. Available formats: MDLV2000, MDLV3000
attribute.name: format

attribute.description: Height of the plugin.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: User presentable name for this component.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Type of the plugin. Available plugin types: OpenChemLibJS, MolPaintJS, MarvinJS.
attribute.name: pluginType

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this plugin prevents value changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: The client-side variable name of a Promise object that embeds the plugin's JavaScript instance. This instance is of type molecularfaces.StructureEditor (editor plugin) or molecularfaces.StructurePlugin (viewer plugin).
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Width of the plugin.
attribute.name: width
